channel.title: Wild Thing Arduino Overview
channel.description:
One of my former students put together this awesome video about working with the Arduino as the control system for modifying a Wild Thing. Thanks to George Whitehill for the time and effort he put into this. Lots of info packed into a short time!
https://youtu.be/y9WhI3cmRRw
